question: If accidently the Mazi falls on ones clothes or on the bedsheet?
answer:
QUESTION
If accidently the Mazi falls on ones clothes or on the bedsheet,can it be cleaned by washing it by tap water in reference to the Hadith of the Holy Prophet Muhammad (S.A.W)"Wash water with water"?
ANSWER


Share:
The soiled portion of the clothes and bed-sheet will be purified by washing it with water.

And Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
